story.iWant: set up the Unity environment and configure the project structure for the ultra-simplified coin animation system
story.soThat: I have a solid foundation with zero external dependencies, optimized packages, and project settings properly configured for developing the coroutine-based animation system
story.tasks: 7 main tasks covering Unity version configuration, URP setup, zero dependency management, project structure, package management, build settings, and environment validation

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Unity project must be configured with Unity 2021.3 LTS or later version compatibility 2. Universal Render Pipeline (URP) must be properly installed and configured for optimized rendering 3. Project must maintain zero external dependencies, using pure Unity coroutine implementation 4. Project directory structure must follow simplified organization with Core/, Animation/, Examples/, Tests/ folders 5. Unity Package Manager must be configured with only essential core dependencies 6. Build settings must be optimized for target platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux) 7. Input validation and error handling systems must be established for the development environment

doc.title: Technical Specification: Responsive Intelligent Coin Animation System MVP
doc.snippet: Unity Engine Requirements: Unity Version 2021.3 LTS (minimum), 2022.3 LTS (recommended), 2023.2+ (advanced features); Render Pipeline: Universal Render Pipeline (URP) 12.0+ required for shader optimization

The system will follow a modular component design with: Event-driven architecture for decoupled communication; Singleton pattern for centralized animation management; Zero dependencies strategy for maximum compatibility
